mapper.insert: INSERT INTO search_history (sch_id, board_idx, sch_keyword, sch_date, sch_type) VALUES (#{userId}, #{dto.board_idx}, #{dto.keyword}, NOW(), #{dto.search_type})
mapper.select:
SELECT p.post_idx AS postIdx, p.post_title AS postTitle, p.post_content AS postContent, p.id AS writerId, p.post_create_date AS createdDate FROM post p WHERE p.post_blind_yn = false
AND p.post_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND (p.post_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR p.post_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
AND p.id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND 1 = 0
